Summary: The presentation discusses a software suite for hardware-accelerated Monte Carlo event generation, focusing on efficiency and performance improvements on GPU.

Title: McMule -- a Monte Carlo generator for low energy processes
Summary: McMule is a Monte Carlo generator for low-energy processes involving leptons, enhancing event generation at NNLO and reducing negative weights through cellular resampling.

Title: Total 10-th order QED electon anomalous magnetic moment calculation
Summary: The presentation covers a 5-loop QED calculation for the electron anomalous magnetic moment, including new Monte Carlo integration methods and gauge-invariant classes.
Keywords: ['QED', 'electron anomalous magnetic moment', 'Monte Carlo integration', 'Feynman diagrams']

Title: Multiscale Lattice Gauge Theory Algorithms and Software for Exascale hardware.
Summary: The talk covers algorithm and software development in lattice gauge theory for GPU architectures and calculations related to the muon's magnetic moment.
